definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Soon, all the blue-wizard both eat something the cake.
sentences.chinese: 不一会儿，所有的蓝精灵都吃起了蛋糕。

sentences.english: In fairness, you probably haven't got high hopes for this year's movie adaptation of The Smurfs.
sentences.chinese: 公平地说，你可能不会对改编的电影蓝精灵寄予厚望。

sentences.english: And notice the address of the official Smurf website?
sentences.chinese: 注意了蓝精灵的官方网站地址么？

sentences.english: The smurfs?Tempranillo, tough skin, delicious, good tannin.
sentences.chinese: 蓝精灵？皮厚，甜美，单宁丰富的丹魄葡萄。

sentences.english: Some people hate Apple a lot, more than they hate Nazis or Smurfs.
sentences.chinese: 有些人十分痛恨苹果，胜过恨纳粹或蓝精灵。

sentences.english: The Smurf is actually the result of a symbiotic relationship between two organisms.
sentences.chinese: 蓝精灵事实上是由两种有共栖关系的生物产生的。

definition: galley proof (printing)/unimpressive/(coll.) little guy (mild insult also used as an affectionate term)
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
Aesop (trad. 620-560 BC), Greek slave and storyteller, supposed author of Aesop's fables
